name: User Goals API
description: A Sample API for the 'Crash Course - Practical API Management' Workshop.

THREESCALE_ADMIN_EMAIL.description: Email address for the admin user of the account that will be created in 3scale

THREESCALE_ADMIN_PWD.description: Password for the admin user of the account that will be created in 3scale. To log in to account

SUBDOMAIN.description: Your chosen subdomain for your 3scale admin portal (e.g. if example is chosen as subdomain, admin portal will be at example-apistrat-admin.3scale.net). If none is chosen, ORG_NAME will be used.

NGINX_HOST.description: Domain of Nginx host (for OAuth2 implementations only)
